mapper.select: select acc.account,info.provinceId,info.cityId,info.countyId from zgk_user_account acc left join zgk_user_info info on acc.id=info.id where acc.id=#{accountId} limit 0, 1

select id, departmentCode, companyCode, parentCode, departmentPhone, departmentFax, departmentPrincipal, departmentName, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier, roleType, areaCode, salePrice, goodsAddress FROM zgk_system.k12system_department WHERE areaCode = #{areaCode} limit 0,1

select od.order_no as orderNo, od.product_price as amount, od.create_date as createDate, od.status as payStatus, od.goods_count as productNum, od.product_type as productType, od.unit_price as unitPrice, pro.productName as productName, od.handle_state as handleState from zgk_order od LEFT JOIN zgk_system.zgk_sale_product pro on od.product_type=pro.type where od.user_id=#{userId} and od.state!='Y' order by od.create_date desc
